code: import ApolloClient from"apollo-boost";import{config}from'../config';export var client=new ApolloClient({uri:"https://api.github.com/graphql",request:function request(operation){operation.setContext({headers:{authorization:"Bearer ".concat(atob(config.githubConvertedToken))}});}});export var userClient=function userClient(token){return new ApolloClient({uri:"https://api.github.com/graphql",request:function request(operation){operation.setContext({headers:{authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});}});};
